item.title: Citrix - Unable to connect to the CGP tunnel destination
item.description: Citrix users are receiving an error on login. The Citrix server is reporting a number of Event ID: 118 errors. Open the Terminal Services Manager and check for disconnected listeners. In my case the ICA Listener was down (disconnected). Resetting the listener resolved the issue.

item.title: Citrix ICA not listening on port 1494
item.description: I ran into an issue with some Citrix servers in the environment. Users were getting a protocol driver error. After poking around I noticed ICA was not listening on port 1494. It appears that this issue was caused by Microsoft patch MS12-024. Known issues with this security update After you install this security update on a Windows Server 2003 SP2-based terminal server, Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) clients or Independent Computing Architecture (ICA) clients may be unable to connect to the terminal server.
